title: Implementing Authentication in Angular with Keycloak JS: A Complete Guide
description: Learn how to integrate Keycloak authentication into Angular using the official keycloak-js adapter with route guards, HTTP interceptors, and role-based access control.
author: Michael Kopp

title: Database Migrations with Flyway in Spring Boot: A Practical Guide
description: A comprehensive guide to managing database schema migrations in Spring Boot using Flyway, covering best practices, versioning strategies, and production deployment.
author: Michael Kopp

title: CORS Configuration in Spring Boot: A Best Practice Guide
description: Learn how to configure CORS in Spring Boot in a secure, flexible, and maintainable way using centralized configuration and externalized properties.
author: Michael Kopp

title: A Deep Dive into the Keycloak JWT OAuth2 Implementation
description: Detailed analysis of securing a Spring Boot backend using Keycloak with JWT for OAuth2 authentication, including role extraction and custom converters.
author: Michael Kopp

title: Taming the Monorepo: How We Use Nx to Manage Our Full-Stack Application
description: Why we chose a monorepo approach and how we use Nx to manage our Angular frontend and Spring Boot backend in a single workspace.
author: Michael Kopp

title: The Power of Server-Side Rendering with Angular Universal
description: How we use Angular Universal for Server-Side Rendering to enhance SEO and improve performance, including containerization with Docker.
author: Michael Kopp

title: Our Deployment Pipeline: From git push to Production
description: A deep dive into our CI/CD pipeline using GitHub Actions, Docker, and Docker Compose to automate deployment from code push to production.
author: Michael Kopp
